channel.title: Ephomera
channel.description:
Forums: www.Ephomera-rsps.webs.com - yes i know sorry for using .webs shit Download: http://ephomera-rsps.webs.com/Ephomera.jar Webclient: http://ephomera-rsps.webs.com/webclient Summary: Ephomera is a classic pk/eco server that I am trying to base off Pwnxile because it was my fav server in like 2010. So I started taking classes on java programming and when Pwnxile closed down I found an old 317 that I now am coding on. Features: Point system -slayer/pking/vote(coming soon)/Pest Control. -Amazing combat system -Staff open!!! This doesnt mean come in and get staff this means you can get staff if you work for it! -Good not too slow or fast xp rates! -Automated double xp weekends -Added a few customs(Colored whips, divines) -All GODWARS bosses(zammy,armadyl,guthix,sara) -Fun many games with Castlewars coming soon!(PEST CONTROL, BARROWS, DUEL ARENA, JAD) -All skills finally work!! -No shitty trisidia/insidia base everyone uses -Same pwnxile home(pretty unique) -Working dfs spec and ALL other specs! -Taking all coding suggestions and will do all(if possible) -Going to add alot of things to make this server unique(npc's,systems,portals,ships,custom whips with spec) -Bosses drop caskets you open for rares and armors! -Webclient and download client ftw -Recently added barbarian village!
Media: Skills [img]http://i.imgur.com/wPzuweK.png[/img] PVP [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/8955/o1e4.png[/img] Home [img]http://i.imgur.com/cxkbDsF.png[/img] Point Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/0xH89rS.png[/img] Godwars [img]http://i.imgur.com/cZDHg0S.png[/img] Near future updates: Clue scrolls Secret update - 100% unique when it comes out!!! Castlewars Suggest more if my server is boring to you. Will I release this? Yes, eventually
bump*

item.title: Ephomera
item.dc:creator: @du_arwi du arwi
item.description:
@du_arwi wrote:

Forums: www.Ephomera-rsps.webs.com - yes i know sorry for using .webs shit
Download: http://ephomera-rsps.webs.com/Ephomera.jar
Webclient: http://ephomera-rsps.webs.com/webclient
Summary: Ephomera is a classic pk/eco server that I am trying to base off Pwnxile because it was my fav server in like 2010. So I started taking classes on java programming and when Pwnxile closed down I found an old 317 that I now am coding on.
Features: Point system -slayer/pking/vote(coming soon)/Pest Control.
-Amazing combat system
-Staff open!!! This doesnt mean come in and get staff this means you can get staff if you work for it!
-Good not too slow or fast xp rates!
-Automated double xp weekends
-Added a few customs(Colored whips, divines)
-All GODWARS bosses(zammy,armadyl,guthix,sara)
-Fun many games with Castlewars coming soon!(PEST CONTROL, BARROWS, DUEL ARENA, JAD)
-All skills finally work!!
-No shitty trisidia/insidia base everyone uses
-Same pwnxile home(pretty unique)
-Working dfs spec and ALL other specs!
-Taking all coding suggestions and will do all(if possible)
-Going to add alot of things to make this server unique(npc’s,systems,portals,ships,custom whips with spec)
-Bosses drop caskets you open for rares and armors!
-Webclient and download client ftw
-Recently added barbarian village!

                                                                       Media:
                                                                                Skills
                                                [img]http://i.imgur.com/wPzuweK.png[/img]
                                                                                PVP
                                                [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/8955/o1e4.png[/img]
                                                                                Home
                                                [img]http://i.imgur.com/cxkbDsF.png[/img]
                                                                                Point Shop
                                                [img]http://i.imgur.com/0xH89rS.png[/img]
                                                                                Godwars
                                                [img]http://i.imgur.com/cZDHg0S.png[/img]

Near future updates: Clue scrolls
Secret update - 100% unique when it comes out!!!
Castlewars
Suggest more if my server is boring to you.
Will I release this? Yes, eventually

bump*

Read full topic
